body: How come you see your skin in hub but not in a game. Some peoples skins work, others don't. Is it the server files not transferring or Mojang skin server being funny?
body_tagged: How come you see your skin in hub but not in a game. Some peoples skins work, others don't. Is it the server files not transferring or Mojang skin server being funny?
title: No Skin ?

replies.body:
ATTENTION: 
Due to a bug in 1.7.9 the skins aren't able to work properly.

But 1.7.10
Has Fixed it!
replies.body_tagged:
ATTENTION:

replies.body: Avicus doesn't support 1.7.10 skins I believe, (I may be wrong, don't judge me) so you're better off downgrading to 1.7.4.

replies.body: Is this another spam topic? We have talked about this a couple of times now and sorted it out, it's because of the bug. So why did you create a new topic about it when you seem so aware of the spam?
